name: MOE
description:
Enter the world, unlike you ever seen before, yet... so similar to ours.
This is a 3D adventure platformer with story, that you build up with your own choices. You start by living in a small village underground, you are given an opportunity to talk with villagers, understand and participate in their lifestyle, hearing about their concerns or reasons for a happy life in the village. As you live in the village, you start asking questions, that are noted in your notebook as you go, on which it is possible to find answers, but only by doing correct sacrifices.

And then you are encountered with a choice of what to do next: live in the village like everybody does, or find answers on your questions in the harsh and cruel outside world, which lies after The Great Gates.

Explore the Unknown!
Explore the unique and extraordinary world and uncover secrets behind what it is and how it works.

Become your true self!
Make choices, which your heart tells you to make. Become a person you wish to become on a journey to the Belly of the whale.

Find your own meaning!
Pursue the questions you find meaningful, and ultimately discover the meaning of existence!MAIN FEATURES
  • Fun movement mechanics, including jump, dive and jump of walls, that you can use in unique environments and engaging puzzles.
  • Exciting combat, where you can use a variety of abilities, weapons and meet extraordinary opponents.
  • Asking questions, in the world, where secrets and unfamiliar phenomena lies behind every corner.
  • Progress, your abilities and skills in simple but emergent parts of gameplay.
